segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists

segment.source: The topics in this section provide checklists that you can use when installing the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system.
segment.target: The topics in this section provide checklists that you can use when installing the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system.

segment.source: Describes the tasks that must be completed before starting the installation of the App-V system.
segment.target: Describes the tasks that must be completed before starting the installation of the App-V system.

segment.source: Describes the tasks that must be completed while installing the App-V system.
segment.target: Describes the tasks that must be completed while installing the App-V system.

segment.source: Describes the tasks that must be completed after the installation of the App-V system.
segment.target: Describes the tasks that must be completed after the installation of the App-V system.

segment.source: Describes the tasks to be completed when upgrading the App-V system and the correct sequence for those tasks.
segment.target: Describes the tasks to be completed when upgrading the App-V system and the correct sequence for those tasks.
